title: Soda beer bread
ingredients: ['250g strong wholemeal bread flour or regular wholemeal flour', '275g wholegrain rye flour', '2 teaspoons bicarbonate of soda', '1 teaspoon salt', '1 tablespoon caraway seeds', '200g currants, rinsed and dried', '240ml buttermilk, at room temperature', '240ml stout, at room temperature, more as needed', '1 tablespoon demerara sugar (optional, only if not using currants)']
